Description: Help you with Backup, Archive, Big Data Analytics, Disaster Recovery, and much more.
Name: Amazon S3

Methods.Name: List Buckets
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all buckets owned by the authenticated sender of the request.

Methods.Name: Get Object (JSON)
Methods.Description: Get the details of a JSON object.

Methods.Name: Get Object (XML)
Methods.Description: Get the details of an XML object.

Methods.Name: Add Object (CSV)
Methods.Description: Generate a CSV file in the chosen bucket.

Methods.Name: Add Object (Entire Response)
Methods.Description: Generate a JSON file in the chosen bucket, based on the entire response of another step.  It is expected that the previous step has a custom field with the location of (.) without the brackets.

Methods.Name: Add Extended File Object
Methods.Description: Generate a file in the chosen bucket. Supports all file types.

Methods.Name: Get Object
Methods.Description: Get the details of an object.

Methods.Name: Add Object
Methods.Description: Generate a file in the chosen bucket. Supports JSON, CSV or XML types.

Methods.Name: List Updated Objects
Methods.Description: Returns objects in a bucket that have been created or updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Object (CSV)
Methods.Description: Get the details of a CSV object.

Methods.Name: Add Object (JSON)
Methods.Description: Generate a JSON file in the chosen bucket.

Methods.Name: Add Object (JSON) (Mapped Fields)
Methods.Description: Generate a JSON file in the chosen bucket. The fields of the object must be mapped individually as custom fields.

Methods.Name: Delete Object
Methods.Description: Removes the null version (if there is one) of an object and inserts a delete marker, which becomes the current version of the object.

Methods.Name: Add Object (XML)
Methods.Description: Generate an XML file in the chosen bucket.
